about_the_game:
We just found a new planet! This weird little flat planet looks great for another space colony.

In this can you can:
Terraform to build mountains, waterfalls and your own creative landscapes.
Decorate the planet with props to customize YOUR own Xagonia.
Grow trees and crops to make profit and unlock more fancy stuff.
Go on a roguelike adventure to nearby planets and collect extraterritorial resources for your own colony.
Hint: You will probably find alien seeds that you have never seen on Xagonia
Invite alien residents to start their new life and build a cozy town on Xagonia.

I am a solo developer. Any feedbacks are welcome. I am looking forward to perfect this game with all of you!
